exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Enhancement
exterior.description: Enhance the curb appeal by adding a variety of plants, shrubs, and flowers. Install a small garden with a mix of perennials and annuals. Consider adding a stone pathway and a small water feature to create a welcoming entrance.

exterior.title: Deck Refinishing and Expansion
exterior.description: Refinish the existing deck to improve its appearance and durability. Expand the deck to create a larger outdoor living space, adding built-in seating and planters. Consider using composite materials for longevity.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve the overall look and functionality. Consider using decorative concrete or asphalt to enhance the aesthetic appeal.

exterior.title: Fence Replacement
exterior.description: Replace the existing fence with a new, modern design. Use materials like vinyl or wood to ensure durability and privacy. This will enhance the property's security and aesthetic appeal.

exterior.title: Exterior Lighting Upgrade
exterior.description: Install new exterior lighting to highlight architectural features and improve safety. Consider energy-efficient LED lights and smart lighting systems for added convenience.

living area.title: Flooring Upgrade
living area.description: Replace the existing flooring with high-quality laminate or engineered hardwood to enhance the aesthetic appeal and durability of the living area.

living area.title: Lighting Enhancement
living area.description: Install modern LED recessed lighting to brighten the space and create a more inviting atmosphere.

living area.title: Wall Paint Refresh
living area.description: Apply a fresh coat of neutral paint to the walls to give the living area a clean and updated look.

living area.title: Window Treatment Update
living area.description: Replace old window treatments with modern blinds or curtains to improve aesthetics and energy efficiency.

living area.title: Open Concept Conversion
living area.description: Remove non-load-bearing walls to create an open-concept living and dining area, enhancing the flow and spaciousness of the home.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refinishing
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing dark cabinets to a lighter, more modern color to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

kitchen.title: Countertop Replacement
kitchen.description: Replace the laminate countertops with a more durable and attractive material like quartz or granite to enhance the kitchen's appeal.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Install modern LED lighting fixtures to improve the kitchen's ambiance and energy efficiency.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Installation
kitchen.description: Add a stylish backsplash to the kitchen to give it a more finished and contemporary look.

kitchen.title: Hardware Update
kitchen.description: Replace cabinet handles and knobs with modern hardware to give the kitchen a quick and cost-effective facelift.

bath.title: Update Bathroom Fixtures
bath.description: Replace outdated faucets, showerheads, and cabinet handles with modern, water-efficient fixtures to enhance the bathroom's appearance and functionality.

bath.title: Install New Vanity and Mirror
bath.description: Replace the existing vanity with a modern one that includes storage solutions. Add a stylish mirror with integrated lighting to improve aesthetics and functionality.

bath.title: Upgrade Shower Area
bath.description: Install a new glass shower enclosure and update the tiles to a contemporary design. This will make the bathroom look more spacious and luxurious.

bath.title: Improve Lighting
bath.description: Add recessed lighting and replace existing light fixtures with energy-efficient LED options to brighten the space and reduce energy costs.

bath.title: Repaint Walls
bath.description: Apply a fresh coat of paint in a neutral color to make the bathroom feel clean and modern. This is a cost-effective way to refresh the space.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace the existing carpet with hardwood or laminate flooring to enhance the aesthetic appeal and increase property value.

bedroom.title: Paint Walls and Ceilings
bedroom.description: Apply a fresh coat of neutral paint to the walls and ceilings to brighten the space and make it more appealing to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Install Built-in Closet Organizers
bedroom.description: Add built-in closet organizers to maximize storage space and improve functionality, which is attractive to buyers.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options to improve lighting quality and energy savings.

bedroom.title: Add Crown Molding
bedroom.description: Install crown molding to add a touch of elegance and sophistication to the bedrooms, enhancing their visual appeal.
